name: react-plotly.js-editor
description: A React component for plotly.js charts
author: Plotly, Inc.

scripts.start: budo example/src/index.js --dir example/src --dir example --dir src --open --live --host localhost -- -t [ babelify --presets [ es2015 react ] --plugins transform-class-properties ] -t brfs
scripts.example:build:js: browserify example/src/index.js -t [ babelify --presets [ es2015 react ] --plugins transform-class-properties ] -t brfs -g [ envify --NODE_ENV production ] -g uglifyify -p bundle-collapser/plugin | uglifyjs --compress --mangle > example/dist/index.js
scripts.example:build:assets: rm -rf example/dist/assets && cp -r example/assets example/dist/assets && cp src/react-plotly.js-editor.css example/dist
scripts.example:build: rm -rf example/dist && mkdirp example/dist && npm run example:build:html && npm run example:build:js && npm run example:build:assets
scripts.make:lib: mkdirp lib && babel src --out-dir lib --ignore=__tests__/* --presets=es2015,react --source-maps --plugins babel-plugin-add-module-exports
scripts.make:build: mkdirp build && browserify src/PlotlyEditor.js -o ./build/PlotlyEditor.js -t [ babelify --presets [ es2015 react ] ] -t browserify-global-shim --standalone createPlotlyComponent && uglifyjs ./build/PlotlyEditor.js --compress --mangle --output ./build/PlotlyEditor.min.js --source-map filename=build/PlotlyEditor.min.js.map
